sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_esign.ESignConfigTableList</api_name>
        <caller_access>2</caller_access>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ESignConfigTableList</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ESignConfigTableList = Class.create();
ESignConfigTableList.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },	
	process: function() {
		var candidateTables = [];
		var tables=[];
		tables = new GlideTableHierarchy("task").getTableExtensions();
		
		for(var tab in tables){
			
			var gr = new GlideRecord(tables[tab]);
			if(gr.canCreate())
				candidateTables.push(tables[tab]);
		}
		return candidateTables;
	},
    type: 'ESignConfigTableList'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-02-14 12:08:32</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1231c1bab7672300a251e556ee11a902</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ESignConfigTableList</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="E-Signature" source="sn_esign">52bf58b1b703230088d9bc78ee11a987</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="E-Signature">52bf58b1b703230088d9bc78ee11a987</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1231c1bab7672300a251e556ee11a902</sys_update_name>

    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
